Articles.Content: I have modelled my part and done all the texturing, but I have now got to the bit where i wanna customise my part, so how do I go about adding a crew hatch?
Why is "Airlock" not an option for me under tag?

You have to create the Airlock and Ladder tags yourself, as well as the user layer "Part Triggers" (which MUST be layer #21)

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Adding_Airlocks_and_Ladders_to_Parts

You have to create the Airlock and Ladder tags yourself, as well as the user layer "Part Triggers" (which MUST be layer #21)

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Adding_Airlocks_and_Ladders_to_Parts

Hmm I've added it but it still doesn't show up in the drop down. I wish the tutorial was a little more detailed. I might just be dumb though

Edit: pic

Edited November 30, 2014 by clown_baby

http://youtu.be/ux_9tO6PShA?t=20m00s

Airlock and Ladder tags go under "Tags"; click on the blank entry and enter the tag name, a new blank entry will be added automatically.

Airlocks and Ladders also need to be added to "Part Triggers" layer #21

http://youtu.be/ux_9tO6PShA?t=20m00s

Airlock and Ladder tags go under "Tags"; click on the blank entry and enter the tag name, a new blank entry will be added automatically.

Airlocks and Ladders also need to be added to "Part Triggers" layer #21

This video is incredibly helpful. Thanks nil. I'll have working hatches soon.
